attributes.action: Strip non-doms and others that have avoided paying UK tax of any Honours they have been awarded
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Non-doms avoid paying UK tax that every other UK citizen has to pay. Yet many have been awarded Honours recognising their "services" to the country. If they are not prepared to pay full and fair rates of tax (including for past avoidance), then they should be stripped of their Honours.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
